channel.title: Decimation-X
channel.description:
Hi guys, I have been working from Richscape base for a while now and thought I would share what I have done, I also got bored of it lols.
317's are so simple to code it's actually boring.
[size=20pt]THIS IS MY FIRST RELEASE!![/size]
So go easy on me please ;)
Updates: Fixed trade.
Christmas Shop pic 1
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/jake_tyrrell/Shop1.jpg[/img]
Christmas Shop pic 2
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/jake_tyrrell/Shop2.jpg[/img]
Home pic 1
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/jake_tyrrell/Home.jpg[/img]
Home pic 2
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/jake_tyrrell/Home2.jpg[/img]
Mod (blue) Admin (spike) and Owner (purple) glows
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/jake_tyrrell/Glows.jpg[/img]
PKBox
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/jake_tyrrell/PKBox.jpg[/img]
Train
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/jake_tyrrell/Train.jpg[/img]
Theiving
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/jake_tyrrell/Theiving.jpg[/img]
Giant Mole
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/jake_tyrrell/Mole.jpg[/img]
Skill cape shop (only accseesble after you reach 99 in a stat)
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/jake_tyrrell/Hansshop.jpg[/img]
Crafting
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/jake_tyrrell/Crafting.jpg[/img]
Character Cutomisation
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/jake_tyrrell/Charselect.jpg[/img]
Armor shop
[IMG]http://i381.photobucket.com/albums/oo256/jake_tyrrell/Arm0rs.jpg[/img]
I added more but find it yourself, :)
DOWNLOAD:
Client & server In same folder.
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?tml10yqngyg]http://www.mediafire.com/?tml10yqngyg[/url]
Credits: 45% to `Rich 45% to Me 5% to all the TuT's I used.

item.title: Decimation-X
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

[quote=“heroisgay, post:14, topic:250429”][quote author=Pureman0194 link=topic=330263.msg2580281#msg2580281 date=1229227592]

Sorry but its nothing special, moving stuff around , changing things in cfg files , adding/moving objects doesnt show a good server. I guess it is ok for your first server but servers these days are nothing but moved around objects & npcs. They practically just move the things the people who made it around so it doesnt look like the original(if that).

Fuck you, he tried didn’t he?

look…the point is he tried, and i support everyone who tries…

i dont care if its the worst piece of crap or the best thing ever…

i support all

Thank’s someone nice 4 once…

Brill work man XD.
[/quote]

Lol did i say he didnt try? I’m not going to say its the best server in the world when he clearly didn’t do much to the source. I’m not going to be like you people who tell people that moving a few objects around has made their server own, and by “mixing czar with richscape” i meant you just added a item or command or w/e that alot of people used to use when every1 was using czar.[/quote]

I believe its called constructive criticism

Read full topic

item.title: Decimation-X
item.dc:creator: @Pureman0194 Pureman0194
item.description:
@Pureman0194 wrote:

jmood128:

anyways you picked a good server to code it has alot to offer but has space for more i am using richscape for my server i found out how to make the quest tab to open i spent 3 hours looking back a forth tho. like 3 diff sources and i finaly figured it out it was so simpile i was mad and i added skillcape emotes to it haven’t had much time to code it =\

Yes RichScape is a good base

[quote=“tonypker13, post:35, topic:250429”][quote author=cloudscape link=topic=330263.msg2580548#msg2580548 date=1229233714]

  1. jmood I added CC then removed it
  2. Tony, It is for xmas only, when xmas is over you can’t buy them anymore, they also vost 1.5B each
  3. klorox, it says 45% rich and also i edited the shit out of it so gtfo mr 10 rep member.
    [/quote]
    Rep is only a number, and you don’t have much more then him.

Dude, 1. I MADE the commands myself, added booleans my self added ints myself and 2. I didn’t just move a few items around, I havent seen you release an amazing and unique server yet.

Oh em gee im sorry you “added booleans and ints yourself” i guess i should bow down now. Oh and gratz on learning how to add a command!

And @ the “I havent seen you release an amazing and unique server yet.” Do you know how many great programmers never released their sources (and never will). I’m not saying i am one of them, but the point im trying to get across here since you might not understand, is that ‘no’ i will not release a source. 1. I think releasing a source is pretty much pointless unless you want to see tons of failed copies of your sources everywhere. And 2. im just not the kind of person who does that.

If you havent got anything nice to say ass wipe dont say it now fuck off is thread

Haha, and you call ME a flamer.[/quote]

Stay off the topic Tony

Read full topic
